CustomField.description: For reporting only 0 = Name 1 = Street 2 = City 3 = State 4 = Postal Code 5 = Billing Country 6 = Phone 7 = Fax 8 = Website 9 = Industry Group 10 = Industry Umbrella 11 = Ownership
CustomField.formula: Company__r.Name + '|01|' + Company__r.BillingStreet + '|02|' + Company__r.BillingCity + '|03|' + Company__r.BillingState + '|04|' + Company__r.BillingPostalCode + '|05|' + Company__r.BillingCountry + '|06|' + Company__r.Phone + '|07|' + Company__r.Fax + '|08|' + Company__r.Website + '|09|' + Company__r.Industry_Group_REPORTING__c + '|10|' + Company__r.Industry_Umbrella_REPORTING__c + '|11|' + TEXT(Company__r.Ownership)
CustomField.label: Report Counterparty Company Fields
